EmailTemplate.subject: Counter Rising Jet Fuel Prices Immediately with this Secret Weapon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Are rising jet fuel prices putting pressure on your bottom-line? Are you looking for a better way to squeeze more fuel economy out of your existing fleet? We’ll let you in on a little secret….
You can use cutting-edge algorithms and sophisticated data analytics to inform fuel-saving decisions for your airlines with GoDirect™ Flight Efficiency <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/godirect-flight-efficiency]]>. Identify and attack inefficiencies, inform pilots about shortcuts, optimal climb speeds, cruise altitudes and other opportunities that reduce fuel consumption. All with this unique software solution.
Learn how you can save up to 5% per airline on your fuel bill -- and millions for your airline.
GET CONNECTED NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
